text:
The Three Little Pigs
Once upon a time, three little pigs left their mother and their home in
order
questions: What do the three little pigs do at the beginning of the story?
Why did the three little pigs leave their mother and home?
What do you think the pigs might do next after leaving home?

text:
in
order to seek their own fortunes and to build their own houses.

questions: Why did people move to new places?

text:
Suddenly, the big bad wolf came upon the first little pig’s house.
He knocked on the door. ‘Little p

text:

huff and I’ll puff and I’ll blow your house down!’
